explains: n. 基督教；基督教徒的品性

sentences.en: He converted from Christianity to Islam.
sentences.cn: 他由基督教改信伊斯兰教。

sentences.en: The country swayed precariously between Christianity and paganism.
sentences.cn: 这个国家在基督教和异教之间摇摆不定。

sentences.en: When the Christianity became the official religion of Rome, there was no Christmas.
sentences.cn: 当基督教成为罗马的官方宗教时，就没有圣诞节了。
